short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Optimizes site usability and adds useful features
short.es: Optimiza la usabilidad del sitio y agrega características útiles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your experience on Axie Infinity with our Chrome extension! Our tool rearranges some elements on the site to make it easier to use and adds a useful functionality: a direct access to search for similar axies to the one you are viewing. We are working on more improvements and features that will be added in the future, so make sure to have our extension installed to not miss any updates! Download our extension today and enhance your experience on Axie Infinity!
